page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = Remove(Name as C)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The unique name property of an argument. See the SQL::Argument object.

page.description: Remove an argument from the collection.
page.discussion: The Remove() method removes an argument from a SQL::Arguments object.
page.example: dim args as SQL::Arguments args.add("city", "Boston") args.add("state", "MA") ? args.ArgumentNumber("state") = 2 ? args.remove("city") = .T. ? args.ArgumentNumber("state") = 1
